text: "Business" is a 2002 song by American rapper Eminem. It is the fifth and final single from his fourth studio album The Eminem Show (2002). It went to number 4 in Australia, number 6 in the Netherlands and the United Kingdom, number 7 in Ireland, number 14 in New Zealand, number 15 in Germany, number 22 in Austria and number 28 in Belgium. Category:2003 songs Category:Eminem songs
title: Business (song)
